original_title: Vishniac: A Documentary Directed by Laura Bialis
overview: Stunning, iconic, heartbreaking and yet life-affirming at once, Roman Vishniac's photographs of Eastern European Jews in the 1930s are imprinted in our collective memory as the last visual records of a world wiped out in the Holocaust. The story of their creation, and of the fascinating man behind them, has never been told. Until now.  Please help us make the feature documentary VISHNIAC with a tax-deductible donation. Do we have perks?  Of course!
title: Vishniac: A Documentary Directed by Laura Bialis
